titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry ... in person Year's Great Country Music Show The Blackwood Rhythm Band

mods.abstract: Two color (black and red on white) window card announcing Grand Ole Opry stars in person at the year's grest country music show "The Blackwood Rhythm Band" featuring Vern Gosdin, R. W. Blackwood, Donna Blackwood, Judd Pertussi, and Robbie Blackwood. Features a metal photoplate of Vern Gosdin, R. W. Blackwood, Donna Blackwood, Judd Pertussi, and Robbie Blackwood.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
